dsmveehw:attribute.itf.extLinkTechnology.label: dseehw.Label.Attribute.Interface.extLinkTechnology
dsmveehw:attribute.itf.extLinkTechnology.description: A variation of link Technology.Example: CAN Extend,CAN J1939, CAN TP for CAN link Technology (use-able with ADMIN role only)

dsmveehw:attribute.itf.multiplexed.label: dseehw.Label.Attribute.Interface.multiplexed
dsmveehw:attribute.itf.multiplexed.description: true if the technology is multiplexed (use-able with ADMIN role only)
